o-O odd... I don't know what to say sadly. It's got to be an issue with the plugin or a change in config format caused by the plugin. [@RoverDude](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/105198-roverdude/) do you know anything about changes with fstextureswitch with the new firespitter plugin dll?

[@Jiraiyah](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/97667-jiraiyah/) do you have ModuleManager, TextureReplacer, and the Firespitter plugin installed? I noticed I didn't hyperlink TextureReplacer in the <abbr title="Original Post(er).
